caption:
Dealing with a tyrant #HOA board member? 🏠

Our Florida partner, Steven Shack,
shares powerful strategies on our latest Bad HOA podcast! 💪

Learn the “50-10 Rule” that empowers Florida homeowners to remove problematic board members. With just 10% of homeowners on your side, you can call a special meeting to address concerns. With 50%, you can remove that tyrant completely!

Most homeowners don’t realize they have the RIGHT to inspect association records—the perfect way to document selective enforcement and build your case.

No other firm has more experience helping Florida homeowners stand up to tyrannical board members. We recently helped remove THREE problematic board members from one community!

Your home is your sanctuary—don’t let power-hungry board members ruin it. 

#BadHOA #FloridaHOA #HOAAttorney #HOALawyer #HOADisputes #HomeownerRights
